@shapaklekas wrote:

Hello i will release auto donater points system but 1 help with that
i get this error client.java:10850: operator + cannot be applied to int,boolean donatorpts += MYSQL.credits(playerName);

This is my credits

[CODE]public static boolean credits(String playerName)
{
try {
Statement statement = con.createStatement();
String query = “SELECT * FROM points WHERE user = '” + playerName + “’”;
ResultSet results = statement.executeQuery(query);
while(results.next()) {
results.getInt(“credits”);

		}
	} catch(SQLException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	return false;
}[/CODE]
